column1: Speech, Language and Communication (Advanced Studies) MSc/PGDip/PGCert
column3: School of Health and Psychological Sciences
column5: Key informationThis professionally focussed master’s programme is designed for qualified Speech and Language Therapists or those with relevant professional experience. It integrates theoretical and research knowledge with reflections on clinical practice. Delivered online, using a variety of interactive methods, it provides you with a qualification that is highly regarded both professionally and academically.Course overviewThis professionally focussed master’s programme is designed for qualified Speech and Language Therapists or those with relevant professional experience. It integrates theoretical and research knowledge with reflections on clinical practice.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year (up to 3 years) full time, 2 years (up to 5 years) part time
